import React from 'react'; import { Center, Container, Heading, Box, Text, Input, Button, Flex, Img, HStack, Avatar, Stack, } from "@chakra-ui/react"; const Posts = ({ posts}) => { return (
Blog & Article
Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.
{posts.map((item) => { return ( {item.title} {item.description} John Smith 15 March 2022 ); })} Tasty Receipes Chicken MeatBall With Creamy Cheese By Andreas Paul Chicken MeatBall With Creamy Cheese By Andreas Paul Chicken MeatBall With Creamy Cheese By Andreas Paul ); }; export default Posts;
